title: Heal Your Body: Spoken Guided Meditation For Pain & Sickness, Relieve Pain Naturally

channelDescription:
I'm dedicated to sharing a '#peace' of my life with you!  Through the use of #meditation, guided visualization, inspiring talks and relaxation music,  you're about to open yourself to changes of immense harmony for your body, mind and spirit.

Check out the links below for all of our social media platforms and don't forget to grab your FREE sleep meditation!

Weekly Program: 

NEW VIDEOS RELEASE EVERY WEEK!

Occasionally, especially when travelling, I will do extra videos.



IMPORTANT:

Please Note: My meditations, affirmations and talks are never to take the place of professional medical advice - and never listen whilst driving or operating machinery of any kind.

comments: God bless everyone who’s reading this

My wife listens to your guided meditations all the time. Recently she was diagnosed  with colon cancer. She’s in stage 4. She’s not doing well at all. She asks me to play your guided meditations for her. I found this one. She doesn’t always have the strength to do the inhaling and exhaling, but her facial expression looks much more comfortable and calm after she listens to you. Even her heart rate is lower in a good way. Thank you Jason for your work.
Every one who listen this heal and gain good health ❤❤❤❤💪
May all those suffering from physical, mental, or emotional disease be flooded with God's infinite healing and comfort and protection. Amen.
